Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.service

Class MeterService

java.lang.Object
com.PDLB.PPE.API.service.MeterService
@Service public class MeterService extends Object
This service class provides methods for managing meters and their associated data.

  • Method Details

    • createMeter

      public String createMeter(MeterDto meter, String buildingId)
      Creates a new meter.
      Parameters:
      meter - A MeterDto object representing the meter to be created.
      buildingId - The ID of the building the meter belongs to.
      Returns:
      The id of the meter

    • getAllMeters

      public ArrayList<MeterDto> getAllMeters()
      Returns all meters.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MeterDto objects representing all meters.

    • getMetersByBuildingId

      public ArrayList<MeterDto> getMetersByBuildingId(String buildingId)
      Returns a list of meters based on a given building ID.
      Parameters:
      buildingId - The ID of the building to retrieve meters for.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MeterDto objects.

    • getMetersByWalletId

      public ArrayList<MeterDto> getMetersByWalletId(String walletId)
      Returns a list of meters based on a given wallet ID.
      Parameters:
      walletId - The ID of the wallet to retrieve meters for.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MeterDto objects.

    • updateMeter

      public void updateMeter(MeterDto meter)
      Updates an existing meter.
      Parameters:
      meter - A MeterDto object representing the updated meter.

    • deleteMeterById

      public void deleteMeterById(String id)
      Delete a meter by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the meter to be deleted

    • objectsCreator

      private ArrayList<MeterDto> objectsCreator(ArrayList<Meter> meters)
      Creates a list of MeterDto objects based on the provided list of meters.
      Parameters:
      meters - The list of meters to be converted to MeterDto objects.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing MeterDto objects corresponding to the input meters.

    • objectCreator

      private MeterDto objectCreator(Meter meter)
      Creates a MeterDto object from the given Meter object and additional related data.
      Parameters:
      meter - The Meter object to be converted into a MeterDto.
      Returns:
      A MeterDto object representing the input meter with additional related data.
